entry.title: On the generalized Hamming weights of certain Reed-Muller-type codes
entry.summary: There is a nice combinatorial formula of P. Beelen and M. Datta for the $r$-th generalized Hamming weight of an affine cartesian code. Using this combinatorial formula we give an easy to evaluate formula to compute the $r$-th generalized Hamming weight for a family of affine cartesian codes. If $\mathbb{X}$ is a set of projective points over a finite field we determine the basic parameters and the generalized Hamming weights of the Veronese type codes on $\mathbb{X}$ and their dual codes in terms of the basic parameters and the generalized Hamming weights of the corresponding projective Reed--Muller-type codes on $\mathbb{X}$ and their dual codes.
entry.arxiv:comment: An. \c{S}tiin\c{t}. Univ. "Ovidius'' Constan\c{t}a Ser. Mat., to appear
